title: Aleene's Fabric Fusion Glue, 3-Pack
description: Aleene's Fabric Fusion 3 Pack offers trial-size bottles of Fabric Fusion that are great for sampling, smaller projects, on-the-go needs and more! An easy alternative to a needle and thread, this clear, water-based adhesive is nontoxic and machine washable, creating a permanent, flexible bond between fabrics and other embellishments, wash after wash. Each bottle is 0.66 fl. oz., great for stashing in drawers, handbags and more. From clothing to crafting, trust your fabric projects with Aleene's Fabric Fusion Permanent Fabric Adhesive.
